data.name: SimLab VR Viewer
data.description:
Free SimLab VR Viewer is the best tool for you to view and share your VR experiences, 3d models, multiple 360 images and VR collaboration sessions. VR experiences can be created using the free SimLab VR Studio to enable Architectural tours, Mechanical training, Preview sales options, in addition to many other purposes. SimLab VR Studio supports creating VR experiences from a wide range of 3D formats and applications including (SketchUp, Revit, Rhino, SolidWorks, Inventor, AutoCAD, and more). Moreover, you can invite clients, colleagues, and other users into your VR experience to view and interact with the scene together using SimLab VR Collaboration.

Learn More about SimLab Soft: https://simlab-soft.com/

changelog.change_log:
1- Added the ability in VR to switch left-hand between walking and teleportation.
2- Fixed issues with Variable Writer.
3- Changed dimensions scale.
4- Fixed a crash with VR Walking.
5- Fixed a crash on the server-side.

1. Supported hands gestures.
2. Supported up to 8 clipping planes, each with its own objects.
3. Supported search functionality.
4. Supported viewing PowerPoint-like presentations (Images or PDF).
5. Supported viewing Arabic text in 3D scenes.
6. Realistic Avatars.

1- Added the ability to pick an avatar for yourself. 

2- Supported skeletal meshes with higher bone count. 

3- Enabled water effect. 

4- Fixed an issue in GUI with scrollbars.

-Improve overall performance for the application on the headset. 

-Minor enhancements and bug fixing.
We need Record Audio permission to allow the user to enter his notes inside the scene vocally. Also we need it to allow the user to enjoy the collaboration scenes by chatting with others.
We need Record Audio permission to allow the user to enter his notes inside the scene vocally. Also we need it to allow the user to enjoy the collaboration scenes by chatting with others.

Giving the user the option to turn shadows on/off for the scene. 

New demo model for vocational training. 

General enhancements .

Adding support for VR Studio. 

Adding Support for running VR quizzes / Surveys for LMS/LRS (xAPI, SCORM, ..). 

Adding Support for organization selection upon sign in for educational institutes.

Fixes and enhancements.

Supporting the all-new User gadgets system that can be added using SimLab Composer, Where you can add Adjacent objects, HUDs, and  Change controllers objects. 

General Enhancement.
